name: Transmit Thesis
description:
Made in Global Game Jam 2018 where the theme was "Transmission" within 24 hours.

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/transmit-thesis

A short game (1 level only) where you transmit the idea of reaching a certain goal, taking control of different characters as they are hit with the idea. 

*CONTROLS*

 [WASD] - Move, 

[Spacebar] - Jump, 

[Mouse] - Aim, 

[LMB/CTRL] - Transmit Idea
